mknftofr.a.description: Anyone can make an offer on a Uniq

receiver.description: The account to receive the Uniq (optional)

duration.description: The duration of the offer in seconds

acptnftofr.a.description: Only the Uniq owner can accept an offer

offer_id.description: The ID of the offer being accepted

rmnftofr.a.description: The buyer can cancel their offer, unless it is expired

offer_id.description: The ID of the offer being canceled

mkfctofr.a.description: Make a uniq offer on a given factory.

memo.description: The memo string to accompany the transaction

acptfctofr.a.description: Accept the uniq offer made on the factory.

offer_id.description: The offer ID made on the factory

memo.description: The memo string to accompany the transaction

rmfctofr.a.description: Cancel the token uniq offer made on the factory.

canceler.description: The account who cancels the offer

offer_id.description: The offer ID made on the facotry

memo.description: The memo string to accompany the transaction

authmint.b.description: Authorize an account to be able to mint tokens

authorized_minter.description: The account being authorized to mint tokens

quantity.description: The number of tokens being authorized

maximum_uos_payment.description: Maximum amount of UOS that is allowed to be used for the purposes of contract RAM usage

clrmintst.description: Clears (i.e., deletes the rows of) minting status table of a token factory

no_of_entries.description: Optional, the number of entries to delete from the token_factory's mintstat table. If no_of_entries is not specified (i.e., null), all entries are deleted

minimum_resell_price.description: Optional, the minimum resale price for the uniqs of this factory

mintable_window_start.description: Optional, the starting date for minting window

mintable_window_end.description: Optional, the ending date for minting window

trading_window_start.description: Optional, the starting date for trading window

trading_window_end.description: Optional, the ending date for trading window

max_mintable_tokens.description: Optional, max number of tokens in this factory. Null means an unlimited number of tokens

conditionless_receivers.description: Optional, list of accounts that can receive tokens without meeting transfer conditions

stat.description: Optional, factory status. Use null for default

authorized_minters.description: Optional, accounts authorized to mint tokens from the factory

authorized_minter.description: The account being authorized to mint

quantity.description: Quantity that the authorized account can mint

account_minting_limit.description: Max number of tokens an account can mint. Set to null to allow for unlimited tokens per account

transfer_window_start.description: Optional, the starting date for transfer window

transfer_window_end.description: Optional, the ending date for transfer window

default_token_uri.description: URI pointing to the token metadata if there is no token-specific metadata

default_token_hash.description: Optional, hash of static default token metadata

lock_hash.description: Optional, whether to prevent changes to the hashes provided during the factory creation. Defaults to false

maximum_uos_payment.description: Maximum amount of UOS that is allowed to be used for the purposes of contract RAM usage

token_configs.description: List of factories to issue tokens from

token_factory_id.description: ID of the factory from which the tokens should be minted

amount.description: Number of tokens to be minted

authorizer.description: Optional authorizer of the mint. Must be one of authorized minters of the factory

maximum_uos_payment.description: Maximum amount of UOS that is allowed to be used for the purposes of contract RAM usage

token_metadata.description: Optional metadata to be added to the minted tokens

lckfactory.description: Allows a factory manager to lock hashes for the factory, default token and all minted tokens as well as any token minted afterwards

limitmint.description: Sets/Resets the minting limit per account of a token factory

account_minting_limit.description: Max number of tokens an account can mint

setconrecv.description: Set accounts that can receive tokens without meeting transfer conditions

conditionless_receivers.description: List of accounts that can receive tokens without meeting transfer conditions

setdflttkn.description: Set metadata URI and hash for default token of a token factory

uri.description: URI of the default token metadata

hash.description: Hash of the default token metadata

setmeta.b.description: Set metadata uri and hash for a token factory

status.description: State of the factory (0 = Active, 1 = Inactive, 2 = Shutdown)

settknmeta.description: Set metadata uri and hash for a uniq

settrdwin.a.description: Set the trading window for a token factory

trading_window_start.description: Optional, the starting date for trading window

trading_window_end.description: Optional, the ending date for trading window

settrnfwin.a.description: Set the transfer window for a token factory

transfer_window_start.description: Optional, the starting date for transfer window

transfer_window_end.description: Optional, the ending date for transfer window

owner.description: Owner of the tokens to be burned

token_ids.description: List of token IDs to burn

id.description: ID of the token to burn

buy.description: Purchase a token from the resale marketplace

buyer.description: The account that pays for the uniq

receiver.description: The account that receives the uniq

token_id.description: ID of the Uniq to buy

max_price.description: Maximum amount of UOS that is allowed to be used for the purchase

promoter_id.description: The promoter account that receives commission

cancelresell.description: Cancel the resale of a token

token_id.description: ID of the Uniq to cancel resale for

token_ids.description: List of token IDs to transfer

id.description: ID of the token to transfer

resell.description: Place tokens for sale on the resell marketplace

token_id.description: ID of the Uniq to sell

addgrpfcts.description: Adds factory IDs to a factory group

id.description: ID of the factory group in which the factories will be added

factories.description: List of factory IDs to add to the factory group
List of factory IDs to add to the factory group

max_uos_payment.description: Maximum amount of UOS that is allowed to be used for the purposes of contract RAM usage

deletegrp.description: Deletes a factory group with specified id

id.description: ID of the factory group to delete

rmgrpfcts.description: Remove factories from a factory group

id.description: ID of the factory group from which the factories will be removed

factories.description: List of factory IDs to remove from the factory group

updategrp.description: Updates factory group parameters: uri, hash and factory list

id.description: ID of the factory group to update

factories.description: List of new factory IDs to add to the factory group

setprchsreq.b.description: The factory manager can specify purchase options for users

token_factory_id.description: ID of the token factory to assign first-hand purchase option

index.description: Index of the new or updated first-hand purchase option

price.description: Price of the first-hand purchase in UOS or USD

purchase_limit.description: Optional, maximum number of Uniqs that can be purchased from this purchase option

promoter_basis_point.description: UOS share received by the promoter with each purchase done for this option. Specified in basis points (0-1000)

purchase_option_with_uniqs.description: Optional, require user to own Uniqs from specific factories or to pay with Uniqs from specific factories

transfer_tokens_receiver_account.description: This account will receive Uniqs if any of the purchase requirement with Uniqs include transfer (2) strategy

factories.description: List of purchase requirements using Uniqs from other factories

token_factory_id.description: Require user to own or burn/transfer Uniqs from this factory

strategy.description: How to process tokens from the specified factory. Can be either check (use 0), burn (use 1), transfer (use 2)

sale_shares.description: Share which each account receives during the purchase

basis_point.description: Sale share commission specified in basis points

maximum_uos_payment.description: Optional, maximum amount of UOS that is allowed to be used for the purposes of contract RAM usage

group_restriction.description: Optional, user group restrictions for this purchase option. See documentation for details

purchase_window_start.description: Optional, the starting date for purchase window

purchase_window_end.description: Optional, the ending date for purchase window

delprchsreq.a.description: Deletes an existing purchase option of the factory with specified token_factory_id and purchase option with specified index

token_factory_id.description: ID of the token factory which has first-hand purchase option assigned to it

index.description: Index of an existing first-hand purchase option

purchase.a.description: Makes a first-hand purchase from one of the purchase options of the factory

token_factory_id.description: ID of a token factory to purchase from

index.description: Index of first-hand purchase option to use

max_price.description: Maximum amount of UOS you allow to be withdrawn from your account

buyer.description: Account that will pay UOS and/or Uniqs for this purchase

receiver.description: Account that will receive the Uniq from this purchase

promoter_id.description: Optional, promoter of the purchase transaction

user_uniqs.description: List of Uniqs the buyer is willing to provide for this purchase option

token_id.description: ID of the Uniq owned by buyer account which will be used to satisfy the purchase option requirement

strategy.description: How to process the token. Can be either check (use 0), burn (use 1), transfer (use 2). Must match the purchase option requirement

createauct.a.description: Create an Uniq auction with a specified expiry date for the Uniq you own

token_id.description: ID of the Uniq that will be placed on an auction

start_date.description: Optional date of the start of an auction

expiry_date.description: Initial end date of an auction

bidauction.a.description: Bid a specified amount of UOS on a non-expired Uniq auction

token_id.description: Uniq ID to palce a bid on

bidder.description: Account that places a bid on the auction

receiver.description: Optional Uniq receiver account if the bidder wins the auction

settleauct.a.description: Settle an auction that has reached its expiry date transferring the Uniq to the highest bidder and splitting the bid between beneficiaries

token_id.description: Uniq ID for which the auction has expired

cancelauct.a.friendlyName: Cancel an auction without any bids
cancelauct.a.description: Cancel an auction that has no active bids. Only the auction creator can cancel the auction, unless it has expired

token_id.description: Uniq ID for which the auction needs to be canceled

addkeys.a.friendlyName: Add key pairs for Uniq factory
addkeys.a.description: Add new key pairs for Uniq factory, which will be used to store on chain data for Uniq

factory_id.description: ID of an Uniq factory for adding key pairs

key_defs.description: Definition of the key that will be added to factory, which will include name, type, edit rights, editors and default value

name.description: The name of the key, needs to be unique.

type.description: The type of the value stored in the key.

edit_rights.description: Bitmask, determines who can edit the key including asset manager, owner, authorized editor or user group.

editors.description: The editor if authorized editor is set.

default_value.description: The default value of the key which needs to match with type.

setvals.a.description: Update key values or on chain data for Uniq

owner.description: Onwer of the Uniq which values will be updated

editor.description: The editor who is authorized to edit the key's value.

token_id.description: ID of the Uniq which values will be updated

key_values.description: The values of the keys that will be updated.

key_name.description: The name of the key defined in factory keys.

key_value.description: The value that will be set for the key. Value needs to match the type defined in factory keys.
